title: SHOW 116 - Gloria De Piero (Election Special #4)
itunes:title: SHOW 116 - Gloria De Piero (Election Special #4)
itunes:subtitle: Gloria de Piero has been the Labour MP for Ashfieâ€¦
description:
Gloria de Piero has been the Labour MP for Ashfield since 2010 but is standing down at this election. In this electric interview Gloria talks frankly and hilariously about the political challenges she faced locally and nationally and reflects honestly about her time in politics. This is a classic from the outset, enjoy! Follow Gloria on Twitter: @GloriaDePiero Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Email your tales of canvassing and campaigning mishaps to: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com Sign up to Matt's mailing list for advance news on Political Party guest announcements plus other almost cool stuff: www.mattforde.com/mailing-list

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
